scripts.test:fail-jsdoc: echo 'Expecting failure' && eslint jsdoc-fail.js; if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then exit 0; fi
scripts.test:fail-bpk: echo 'Expecting failure' && eslint bpk-token-fail.jsx; if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then exit 0; fi
scripts.test: npm run test:pass && npm run test:fail-jsdoc && npm run test:fail-bpk
